messages.title: A STRONG ECONOMY
messages.content: Securing our economy, supporting businesses to create more jobs and apprenticeships.

messages.title: SUPPORTING OUR NHS
messages.content: Improving the NHS and protecting local hospital services.

messages.title: KEEPING OUR PROMISES
messages.content: A proven track record of delivering on promises.

messages.title: A PROVEN TRACK RECORD
messages.content: Delivering effective campaigns, protecting and improving local services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Boosting local businesses to create more jobs and apprenticeships.
Increasing funding for our National Health Service, working to integrate health and social care.
Improving our schools through better funding and support.
Caring for the needs of the elderly, securing a sustainable long-term plan for social care.
Ensuring the right numbers and location of new homes, protecting the environment and ensuring sufficient support for public services.
Keeping our area green, opposing unsuitable developments, and supporting renewable energy projects.

mentions.candidate: Helen Grant has proven that she is on our side.
mentions.tacticalSituation:
Maidstone and The Weald - one of the 23 seats that can deliver a majority Conservative government with David Cameron as PM.
Just 23 more seats needed

issues.economy: A strong leadership in the national interest... Protecting our economic recovery... Deliver a majority Conservative government... Securing our economy...
issues.environment: Numbers, location and nature of any new housing development must be appropriate... Supporting our communities in every way...
issues.health: Improving the NHS and protecting our local hospital services...
issues.socialWelfare: Delivering on important local issues... Protecting vulnerable people...

housing.content: Numbers, location and nature of any new housing development must be appropriate... protecting the landscape...

leaflet.personalStatement: It's been an absolute privilege to serve the people...

images.caption: Picture of Helen Grant with supportive constituents.
Graphical representation of 23 more seats needed.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Helen has consistently demonstrated her love for our town and countryside.
